column1: Kamyaran (Persian: كامياران‎; Kurdish: کامێران‎‎;  also Romanized as Kāmyārān) is a city in Kamyaran County
column4: of which it is the county seat. As of the 2016 census
column5: the city had a population of 57
column7: 547 families. The word Kamyaran is derived from the word Kāmyār meaning "prosperous".

column1: Being on the main route from Kermanshah to Sanandaj
column2: Kamyaran went through a rapid development in the latter half of the 20th century and early 21st century. Kamyaran is the most southern city in Kurdistan Province near the Morvarid Fault
column3: and it is surrounded by Mount Shaho and Mount Behistun.
